# MDS-data

This is a package through which the example datasets of the MDS-book can be easily imported.

## Change Log

#### 0.1.0 (Dec 26, 2023)
- first release

#### 0.1.1 (Dec 26, 2023)
- cleanup pyproject.toml and README.md

#### 0.1.2 (Jan 30, 2023)
- remove temporary files
- fix documentation
- add MNIST dataset (DS-1)
